::Battera::

She unwrapped her wings and folded them back reveiling her slender 
figure.  She took his hand, but still looked at the floor.
"No appology nessassary. I understand."
She turned and looked at the hatch.  She walked over and went through 
the hatch.  

She stood outside looking up at the sky.  Tears ran down her face. 
She was letting her fear go.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow <twb176@y...> wrote:
> ::WindRider::
> WindRider was ashamed of himself. Ashamed that while a
> lady bot was in danger all he could do was stand there
> like a stupid drone.He offered Battera his hand.
> "I-I'm sorry", he stammered. "I should have come to
> your defense instead of doing nothing. Im a scientist
> and an explorer,and Im not used to being in a combat
> zone.I'm not built for war."
